name: Mirai’s Miscellaneous Misadventures
description:
Join Mirai as she partakes on silly misadventures in this Senran Kagura fangame!

Note that this game is still a very early work in progress. Previous versions can be played and downloaded at my Neocities website. For M25, I’m trying out itch.io to see how it goes. Depending on how I feel about it, I might end up moving entirely from Neocities to itch.io, we’ll see.

edit: I have decided to keep my project only on Neocities going forwards. Once the game matures more, I might revisit the decision and continue using this page. For the time being, at least M26 will remain playable here, but newer versions are going to be released and become available to be played on the game’s Neocities page.

The game (and its custom&dashmade engine) are free software available under the AGPL (version 3 or later). The source can be downloaded on my Neocities page.

The controls are made to be simple. Arrow keys (left and right) move Mirai in that direction, and double&dashpressing an arrow key makes Mirai jump.

For touch devices, it is also possible to press and hold on the left/right side of the screen to walk, and double&dashtap on the screen to jump.
